ygData.subject: Re: jewelcraft trivial
ygData.msgSnippet: This same thing has been happening in blacksmithing for a long time.  It seems that sharpening weapons becomes trivial at 21, but, by sharpening the more
ygData.messageBody:
This same thing has been happening in blacksmithing for a long time. It
seems that sharpening weapons becomes trivial at 21, but, by sharpening the
more expensive weapons like two handed swords there are times when the skill
will improve anyway if you are higher than that.

Mark

Amazing $14,000 Opportunity. Click below for details.
http://www.24689.com


>
>
> Ah, you learn well grasshopper.
>
> The point was (I have a 18th level enchanter on another server with 90+
> skill in jewelcraft), at skill level 20, malachite should not be trivial.
> But I got a message saying it was when I made the item. The very NEXT
time
> I tried making the malachite I got the skill raise. I know you learn when
> you fail, but you shouldnt learn if it is trivial.
>
> Valore
>
